attributes.action: Make Clacton Air Show a weekend event
attributes.additional_details:
Clacton Air Show is a Annual event for Clacton and workers have voiced there opinion saying to make it weekends and not a weekday.

This petition is to make sure the air show is held at weekends and not weekdays, workers can not attend weekdays due to work so why hold it on a weekday?

If clacton air show is held on a weekend more of the working class will attend and it will benefit clacton will additional profits!
